title: Science Domain Technical Communication Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Technical Documentation Experience
context.additional_context: A competency enhancement program for technical communication (TPC) instructional design targeting current elementary science education practitioners, conducted in a blended learning environment utilizing digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can apply core principles of technical communication (e.g., information structuring, visual representation) to science education
Learners can design educational materials using mixed research methods (textbook analysis/instructor interviews)
Learners can develop and apply formative assessment tools to measure and improve learning outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
